content.rendered:
• 4+ Years of hands-on experience working on Drupal based projects.
  • Good experience ideally for both CMS & application development and implementation
  • Work with the latest technologies in Drupal development in a fast paced, modern, forward-thinking environment
  • Knowledge of versions PHP 5.x & 7.x; Drupal 7, 8 & 9 is mandatory along with the knowledge of the Drupal theme layer.
  • Strong working experience with both relational & non-relation databases
  • Experience in Drupal queues and Drupal architecture
  • Knowledge on the best practices for Drupal development
  • Hands on Experience in Restful API & Web Sockets
  • Proven experience in Front end Technologies: In-depth knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX
  • Experience with version control/ Git, CI processes like Jenkins will be an added advantage
  • Experience working in an Agile/Scrum-like environment will be an added advantage.
